description: This file defines a React functional component for a 'Search & Filter Bugs' page in a bug tracker application. It manages local state for search queries, filtering by module and severity, and displays filtered bug data using other components. It contains a static list of sample bugs as fake data.

methods.name: SearchPage
methods.description: React functional component that renders the bug search and filter interface with internal state for query, module, severity, and dynamic results based on filtering logic.

calls: Fake bug filtering logic inside the component
